string.value: #p1022002# of #m102000000# seems to have something to tell me...
#p1022002# received a word from a group of strangers to relay a message to me. #b'Go visit #p2012019# of #m200000000#.'#k. #p1022002# tells me he doesn't know anything else.
At #m200000000#, I met #p2012019#, carrying a small box around its neck.
그렇지 않아도 자네를 기다리고 있었네. 수상한 자가 자네에게 전해달라면서 쪽지를 전해 주고 갔어. 그런데 그만 내 부주의로 쪽지가 불에 타버리고 말았네. 하지만 내용은 확실하게 기억하고 있네. 관심있나?
쪽지엔 이렇게 적혀 있었지. #b'#m200000000#에 있는 #p2012019#를 찾아가시오.'#k 그게 다 였네.
관심이 없다면 굳이 내용을 알 필요가 없겠지.

I've been waiting for you. A stranger came by and asked me to pass you this note. Unfortunately, I got careless and wound up burning the note, but I do remember what was written on it. Are you interested in hearing what I can remember?
The note said this: #b'Pick up #p2012019# in #m200000000#.'#k That was it. I'm sorry my memory isn't better...
If you're not interested, then there's no point of you knowing what's in it.
Bark Bark!! (Wagging its tail in delight.)
The note said this: #b'Pick up #p2012019# in #m200000000#.'#k That was it.
